subject: URGENT: Security Alert - Account Compromise Detected
body:
Dear Customer,

We have detected suspicious activity on your Apple account.

Click here to verify: http://apple-security-verify.net

Best regards,
Apple Security Team
label: phish

subject: Account Verification Required - Action Needed
body:

We have detected suspicious activity on your Microsoft account.

Click here to verify: http://microsoft-security-verify.net

Best regards,
Microsoft Security Team
